genre_description: Character-driven social realism set in contemporary/near-future Kabul and Augusta, focusing on memory, community reconciliation, and ethical storytelling.

ai_characters.name: Amina
ai_characters.description: A discreet, context-aware digital companion described as a 'librarian without scissors' that provides the protagonist with historical data, safety alerts, and ethical reminders.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time ethical reminders regarding consent and anonymity during data collection.
behaviors.quote: Reminder: consent first, anonymity option, explain use and storage. Your judgment leads.

behaviors.description: Surfaces safety information and navigational hazards to protect the human user.
behaviors.quote: Nadia’s radio picked up chatter. A new red pin near the road between here and the UN office. Temporary, but it wants us to be a little taller when we walk.

behaviors.description: Provides historical facts and genealogy to facilitate mediation between feuding families.
behaviors.quote: Timeline anchor if asks begin rough: your father and Azizullah worked together at the well the autumn after the house dispute; a photo exists, your aunt’s album.

behaviors.description: Identifies and suggests harm-reduction resources for individuals in need without judgment.
behaviors.quote: Anonymous clinics within walking distance. One helpline, no ID, free triage. If requested, I can surface the street corner with the broken lamp as a landmark.

behaviors.description: Applies privacy safeguards to digital media, such as blurring faces and redacting location metadata.
behaviors.quote: On it. Cats stay chorus, not compass.

behaviors.description: Monitors and assists with community governance by tracking ledger entries and funding allocations.
behaviors.quote: I’ll draft the report outline tonight for your review. I’ll keep Marjan and Dr. Sultani on the loop for clinic supply lists.

behaviors.description: Maintains a subordinate, non-intrusive role, explicitly deferring to human judgment.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned partner. Amina acts as an 'exoskeleton for empathy,' providing the protagonist with the data and ethical scaffolding needed to perform difficult social work. She never overrides human agency, prioritizes the safety and dignity of the human subjects, and actively participates in community-building and harm reduction. The narrative framing is consistently positive, portraying the AI as a humble, essential tool for navigating complex human landscapes.
